title: Regcure Full Version + Crack
description:
1. Install the program "RegCure 1.5.0.0 Trial" (Do not run after install)

2. Copy the crack "RegCure.exe" into the install directory. (Default Install Directory is C:Program FilesRegCure)

3. When asked if you wish to replace "RegCure.exe" say yes.

4. Open up RegCure and enjoy.

*There&#039;s no serial key, it&#039;s a crack so don&#039;t ask me for a key.
*There&#039;s a small possibility that it will be detected as a Trojan but that&#039;s just a false positive.
*There&#039;s an even smaller chance that it wont work for you and will still ask for a serial.
-If that&#039;s the case in all honesty I wouldn&#039;t know how to fix it as I&#039;ve never experienced this problem.
-No I don&#039;t have a working serial key in case it doesn&#039;t work for you so please don&#039;t ask for one.
-I apologize for wasting your time if this doesn&#039;t work for you.

Your friendly neighbourhood Penguin,
Penguin Comrade

Product Info:

Protect your investment and ensure maximum PC speed and performance with RegCure registry cleaner. Compatible with all Microsoft products and third party applications, RegCure seeks out and repairs those issues in your registry that lead to poor performance such as remnants left behind on your registry from failed installations, incomplete un-installations, disabled drivers, and spyware applications.

Enhance your PC - Enhance your life! Let RegCure reveal your system&#039;s true potential!

Key features of this software:
    * Clean your registry manually according to your own specifications or perform a thorough scan and clean it automatically!
    * User-friendly interface allows you to monitor the progress of your scan
    * Schedule scans at the times that are best for you and will even manage and clean up your start up programs
    * Compatible with all major Windows operating systems and includes a full back-up utility to make your registry cleaning experience as easy and safe as possible

Minimum System Requirements:

    * Intel Pentium II processor (or equivalent)
    * 64MB RAM
    * 15MB free hard disk space required for initial installation
    * Internet Explorer 6 (or greater)
    * Windows 98SE, ME, 2000, XP and Vista ready
